content.raw:
The model should be installed in `/opt/ros/indigo/share/srcsim/models`. 

As said in the tutorial, after typing `source /opt/nasa/indigo/setup.bash`, your `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH` should point to the model directory.

Could you check these two steps on your machine?

I just tested the deb and it works for me except that we forgot to depend on `ros-indigo-stereo-image-proc`:


```
#!c++

sudo apt-get install ros-indigo-stereo-image-proc
```

This should install the missing dependency while we release a new deb.
content.html:
The model should be installed in /opt/ros/indigo/share/srcsim/models.

As said in the tutorial, after typing source /opt/nasa/indigo/setup.bash, your GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH should point to the model directory.

Could you check these two steps on your machine?

I just tested the deb and it works for me except that we forgot to depend on ros-indigo-stereo-image-proc:

sudo apt-get install ros-indigo-stereo-image-proc

This should install the missing dependency while we release a new deb.
